name: Marco Aurélio
about: Software developer passionate about technology and innovation. Currently working on web and mobile software development, using the latest technologies in the market.

items.description2: Working as a Full Stack developer for the Empírica client, using AWS Serverless, Python, and React.

items.label: FullStack Developer - Mog Design
items.description2: Developed a media management platform for Cinemark, using Quasar, VueJS, JavaScript, C#, and dotNet.

items.label: FullStack Developer - Suppi+
items.description2: Developed a B2B refund management platform using Python, ReactJS, JavaScript, and Scss.

items.label: Business Intelligence Developer - KondZilla
items.description2: Developed a BI platform for KondZilla, using Python, Metabase, Docker, Postgres, and APIs (YouTube, Spotify, SocialBlade). The platform allows viewing audience, engagement, and monetization metrics, as well as marketing campaign performance metrics.

items.label: Backend Developer - A55
items.description2: Developed APIs for A55, using Python, Django, Docker, Postgres, and AWS. The APIs provided information for risk analysis.
